author: ajsutton
content: Yep, my 10 little validators are pumping away. Nearly 16,000 attestations produced since the last restart.  About to celebrate 4000 epochs free from the tyranny of finalization.

author: donschoe
content: Regarding validator penalties, it does not appear to hurt being offline unless you completely forget about your node for weeks.

author: donschoe
content: I'm not sure this is a good thing.

author: donschoe
content: I'm all for being mild to short downtimes, but on the other hand, we should be very strict about validators failing their duties long-term....
